cards.card-text: Helpers quietly enhance lives of users for non-standard situations. Examples include scripts that add keyboard functionality, styles that help in wayfinding for the user when that's applicable such as pagination and breadcrumbs, and microinteractions.
Widgets are independent partial components which are meant to add plug and play functionality to landing pages. Examples include the search typeahead, carousels, and modals/lightboxes.
The majority of components are sections, which represent the majority of the html/css/scripts that build the website. Examples include the navigation, hero, and this card section as well.
